UnShareListRequest - Class in ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.share.requests
Do the reverse of the ShareListRequest:
Ask the server to delete the entry where your friend is matched to your shopping list

updateUI() - Method in class ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.share.AnswerHandler
Calls the refresh method on the activity If the activity is already destroyed it simply does nothing (except a little memory leak) This is the only method which is called on the UI thread after the communication with the server
